total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows in the input grid that are filled with the number 7.
Q2: Remove the rows identified in Q1 from the input grid.
Q3: Divide the remaining grid into two equal halves.
Q4: Identify the cells in the first half of the grid that contain the number 2.
Q5: Replace the cells identified in Q4 with the number 8.
Q6: Identify the cells in the second half of the grid that contain the number 6.
Q7: Replace the cells identified in Q6 with the number 8.
Q8: Combine the two halves of the grid to form the output grid.
